name: Planet Rorroh
description:
This is Planet Rorroh. A short 3D sci-fi survival horror game made in Unity.

You play as Sam, a mercenary in a crew with three other mercenaries. You and your crew are setting out on a mission when there's a problem with the ship's Hyperdrive, so the pilot makes a stop on Planet Rorroh.

Most of the sounds in this game are from: www.freesound.org

For more updates on games I'm making or just other stuff, be sure to follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/omogonix
